data.prayer: Father, help the 257,616 believers in San José to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San José, Costa Rica
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in San José, Costa Rica that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of San José, Costa Rica.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in San José, Costa Rica a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, 0.2% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 1,085,334 cultural Christians in the state of San José to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in San José, Costa Rica not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of San José, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.
